projects.name: Trident Hills
projects.description: A sprawling 200-acre integrated luxury township offering residential plots and independent floors at the foothills of the Shivaliks.
projects.overview: Trident Hills is a premium integrated township developed by Trident Realty, located in Panchkula. Spanning over 200 acres, this project offers a unique blend of residential plots and luxurious 3 BHK independent floors. Designed for a holistic lifestyle, it features world-class infrastructure, extensive green spaces, a grand clubhouse, high-street retail, and other modern amenities, all set against a scenic backdrop.
locationHighlights: Scenic views of the Shivalik Hills
Proximity to reputed schools and hospitals

faqs.question: What types of properties are available in Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: Trident Hills offers residential plots in various sizes and 3 BHK independent floors.

faqs.question: When is the possession for Trident Hills?
faqs.answer: The possession for different phases of Trident Hills is scheduled to start from December 2026 onwards.

faqs.question: Is Trident Hills a RERA-registered project?
faqs.answer: Yes, Trident Hills is a RERA-registered township. The RERA registration number for the plotted development is HRERA-PKL-PKL-335-2022.

reviews.name: Sandeep Verma
reviews.comment: Amazing location and concept. The idea of a full township with all facilities is very promising. Booked a plot.

reviews.name: Neha Gupta
reviews.comment: The sample floors look great. The construction quality seems top-notch. Eagerly waiting for possession.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Trident Hills, Sector 4, Pinjore-Kalka Urban Complex, Panchkula, Haryana 134102

projects.name: Trident Panipat
projects.description: An exclusive gated community offering premium residential plots and luxury villas with modern amenities in Panipat.
projects.overview: Trident Panipat is a new benchmark for luxury living in the heart of Panipat. This upcoming gated community is designed to offer a secure and upscale lifestyle with its offering of residential plots and lavish 4 & 5 BHK villas. With a focus on quality construction, thoughtful design, and essential amenities, Trident Panipat aims to be the most sought-after address for families looking for a modern and comfortable home.
locationHighlights: Located in the developing Sector 18 of Panipat
Close to major industrial hubs like Panipat Refinery & NFL
Easy access to hospitals, banks, and markets

faqs.question: What is the starting price at Trident Panipat?
faqs.answer: Trident Panipat offers residential plots starting from approximately ₹80 Lakhs.

faqs.question: Is this a good investment?
faqs.answer: Being a new launch in a prime, developing sector of Panipat with modern amenities, it holds strong potential for appreciation and is considered a good investment opportunity.

faqs.question: What configurations are available?
faqs.answer: The project offers residential plots of various sizes, along with options for 4 and 5 BHK luxury villas.

contactInfo.address: Site Office, Sector 18, Near GT Road, Panipat, Haryana 132103
